originalText.text: The Learning Clubhouse has been a WONDERFUL experience for our whole family. We were nervous new parents leaving our 6 month old in someone else's care for the first time, and Zuleika and Herman have provided an amazing, safe, loving environment not just for our baby, but for us, too! They have taken excellent care of our baby and we could not recommend them more highly.

originalText.text: The Learning Clubhouse Daycare and its generous staff have taken excellent care of my child. I feel very comfortable dropping her off every morning and can concentrate on my work knowing that she is safe, happy, clean, and learning lots of new of exciting things. My daughter's social and verbal skills have improved greatly after starting at this daycare. I am very grateful to Zuleika and her staff and highly recommend this daycare.

originalText.text: My son has been here for the last year, starting at 6 months old. Thanks to the staff at LCD, I've watched him grow by leaps and bounds. As a first time parent, they've helped me grow as well. They care for my son so much; it feels like they treat him like family! It gives me complete peace of mind knowing he's in good hands while I'm at work. LCD has always maintained top notch communication, which is really really important to me. I can't recommend them enough.

originalText.text:
The Learning Clubhouse is a great daycare. They go above and beyond to make our family feel like an extension of their own. Before it was mandatory, they took extra Covid-19 precautions and took my child’s health seriously during this crisis. They are the only place I trusted my 2 year old and newborn to when I needed childcare as the pandemic continued.

In addition to having strict Covid-19 protocols, they are consistent, caring and always send my kids home well-fed (with home cooked meals and fun artwork for the 2 yo). I usually hear singing from their music circle time when I arrive for pick up and leave with happy little ones who I can tell  had a full, creative day!

-Briana O

originalText.text: My daughter has been going to this daycare since 12 weeks old, and she is now 12 months old and I can tell she enjoys her time there.  One of my neighbors asked what daycare do I send my her to because she always looks so happy!   Also, the children in the daycare seem happy and the staff seems to take good care of them.  Any questions or concerns, I just speak with Zuleika and she figures out a way to resolve the problem.  Happy to have my child here and happy that they take good care of her!
